statements: SELECT * FROM leaderboard ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 100;
SELECT score, username FROM leaderboard WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM leaderboard ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, MIN(score), MAX(score) FROM leaderboard GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, username, score FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM leaderboard WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT user_id, username, score FROM leaderboard WHERE username = 'John Doe' OR username = 'Jane Smith'
SELECT user_id, username, score FROM leaderboard ORDER BY username DESC, score ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT MAX(score) AS highest_score, COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM leaderboard
SELECT * FROM leaderboard ORDER BY score DESC, username ASC;
SELECT competition_name, start_date, end_date FROM competition WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, score FROM leaderboard WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND score > 100;
SELECT competition_id, competition_name FROM competition ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM leaderboard WHERE score >= 500 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT username, score FROM leaderboard WHERE username LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM competition WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, username, score, competition_name FROM leaderboard l JOIN competition c ON l.score > 50 AND c.competition_id = l.user_id;
SELECT competition_name, COUNT(*) AS total_participants FROM leaderboard l JOIN competition c ON c.competition_id = l.user_id GROUP BY competition_name ORDER BY total_participants DESC;
SELECT * FROM leaderboard ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY date_added DESC
SELECT id, player_name, DATE(date_added) FROM leaderboard WHERE player_name = 'Alice'
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE score BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT AVG(score) as avg_score FROM leaderboard
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboard ORDER BY score DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, player_name, score, date_added FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY date_added DESC
SELECT player_name, MAX(score) AS high_score FROM leaderboard GROUP BY player_name ORDER BY high_score DESC
SELECT * FROM leaderboard WHERE date_added BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT player_name, COUNT(*) AS total_games_played FROM leaderboard GROUP BY player_name HAVING total_games_played > 5
SELECT user_id, user_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 100;
SELECT competition_id, competition_name FROM competition WHERE competition_name = 'Summer Olympics';
SELECT user_id, user_name, score FROM leaderboard ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM participation WHERE user_id = 101 AND competition_id = 200;
SELECT admin_name FROM admin WHERE admin_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, user_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT competition_name, count(user_id) as total_participants FROM competition JOIN participation ON competition.competition_id = participation.competition_id GROUP BY competition_name ORDER BY total_participants DESC;

SELECT user_name, competition_name, score FROM leaderboard JOIN participation ON leaderboard.user_id = participation.user_id JOIN competition ON competition.competition_id = participation.competition_id WHERE score >= 80 ORDER BY user_name ASC, competition_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM participation JOIN competition USING (competition_id) WHERE score < 50 ORDER BY user_id, competition_id;
SELECT admin_id, admin_name FROM admin WHERE admin_name LIKE '%Smith%' AND admin_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM leaderboard;
SELECT username, score FROM leaderboard WHERE score >= 100;
SELECT * FROM competition ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT competition_name, start_date, end_date FROM competition WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM participant WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM leaderboard ORDER BY score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, score FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score ASC;
SELECT participant.username, leaderboard.score FROM leaderboard_entry INNER JOIN participant ON participant.participant_id = leaderboard_entry.participant_id WHERE leaderboard_id = 1;
SELECT competition_name, start_date, end_date FROM competition WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date;

SELECT competition.competition_name, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM competition_participant INNER JOIN competition ON competition_participant.competition_id = competition.competition_id GROUP BY competition.competition_name HAVING total_participants > 5;
